attributes.additional_details:
Why is it that we have to do everything the old fashioned way. Why can we not vote using the internet, this would make life so much easier and you would double the amount of people voting.

Just imagine you come home from a hard day's work and then you have remember you have to get your arse to polling station to vote.

Why must we vote like this, there has to be a easier and that way is online voting or e-voting.

For the attention of the electoral commission
